message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. After careful consideration, we believe it would be beneficial for both of us if you were to acquire this item. We're willing to extend an exclusive offer of $14000 for the product.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12000. I really like the product, but I have a budget constraint. Can you meet me at $12000?

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and respect your budget constraints. In light of that, I am willing to consider your offer. However, due to the value we place on this product, I must respectfully counter with a price of $13500.
I appreciate your willingness to consider my budget, but $13500 is still a bit out of my range. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm offering $13000 for the product. Can you meet me at this price?
I appreciate your persistence, Bob. Considering the value of the product and your budget, I am willing to negotiate further. My counteroffer is $13250 for the product.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate further, but $13250 is still a bit out of my range. I'm willing to make a slightly larger concession, so I'm offering $13000 for the product. I'm hoping we can meet at this price.
I understand your position, Bob. After careful consideration, I am willing to accept $13125 for the product. This is the highest price I can offer while still ensuring a reasonable profit for myself.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to make one more concession, so I'm offering $13000 for the product. This is my final offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement.

I appreciate your final offer, Bob. After reevaluating the situation, I am willing to accept $13075 for the product. This price ensures a fair balance between your budget constraints and the value I place on the product.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me at $13075, but I'm afraid I've reached the limit of my budget. I'm willing to walk away if we can't meet at $12000 or less. I'm offering $12500 for the product, which is the highest price I'm willing to pay. If you're willing to meet me at this price, I'll buy the product from you.
